prompt: Ultra-realistic e-commerce product photo. Full body shot of a sharp-jawed Indian male model, early 20s, short textured fade haircut, standing with hands in pockets of olive cargo joggers. Wearing a black oversized drop-shoulder graphic tee with abstract geometric white line art print, paired with white chunky platform sneakers. Solid dark navy background (#1a1a2e). Dramatic side lighting with subtle neon blue rim light hitting the right side of his body. Shot on Sony A7III, 85mm lens, f/1.4. Slight confident smirk expression. Full body from sneakers to top of head, no cropping. Ultra-sharp fabric texture visible on the tee. Commercial fashion photography quality.

Ultra-realistic e-commerce product photo. Full body shot of an athletic fit Indian female model, mid-20s, hair pulled in tight high ponytail, standing in powerful hands-on-hips stance. Wearing sage green seamless ribbed sports bra with matching high-waist leggings featuring mesh panel cutouts on outer thigh, white minimalist training shoes. Solid warm off-white background (#f5f0e8). Bright high-key clean studio lighting with soft diffused shadows on ground. Shot on Sony A7III, 85mm lens. Toned arms and abs subtly visible through fabric. Confident determined expression. Full body head to toe. Activewear catalog quality, Nike/Adidas campaign level realism.

Ultra-realistic e-commerce product photo. Full body shot of a muscular athletic Indian male model, mid-20s, clean buzz cut, standing with arms firmly crossed. Solid light grey background (#e8e8e8). High contrast studio lighting creating sharp defined shadows, emphasizing the athletic build. Shot on Sony A7III. Strong confident posture, sports hero energy. Every stitch and zipper detail visible. Full body. Sports catalog commercial quality.
